text:
I'm trying to model a system of stochastic differential equations using ModellingKittool. I have some rectified linear funcitons in my systems and thus I encountered the error: "Only semi-explicit constant mass matrices are currently supported.". This error doesn't appear if I use a ODESystem instead of a SDESystem.
My model for the noise is pretty simple, just a brownian motion added to a few variables. I'm wondering if there would a way to include this kind of noise (trough a new variable maybe?) into an ODESystem in order to not raise the error?
